memberdef.name: gnt_menu_clicked

parameterdescription.para: The type of the menu, whether it's a toplevel menu or a popup menu.

detaileddescription.para: Add an item to the menu.

parameterdescription.para: The item to add to the menu.

detaileddescription.para: Return the GntMenuItem with the given ID.

simplesect.para: The menuitem with the given ID, orNULL.
